name: URL Parsing Regular Expression
description: Match if found : protocol, host, port, filepath
content:
http://33mileradius.com/
http://www.33mileradius.com/
http://subdomain.33mileradius.com:1234/
http://subdomain.33mileradius.com:1234/website.com/
http://sub.subdomain.33mileradius.com:1234/website.com/

https://33mileradius.com/
https://www.33mileradius.com/
https://subdomain.33mileradius.com:1234/
https://subdomain.33mileradius.com:1234/website.com/
https://sub.subdomain.33mileradius.com:1234/website.com/

http://localhost:1234/website.com/
